fullDiskAccess.title: Full Disk Access Required
fullDiskAccess.description: Cardinal needs macOS Full Disk Access to index and monitor files across your system. Please enable Full Disk Access for Cardinal in System Settings.

steps.one: Open System Settings > Privacy & Security > Full Disk Access.
steps.two: Click the lock to make changes and enable Cardinal.
steps.three: When prompted, allow macOS to restart Cardinal.
